text: Sofia Hayat is a spiritual guru, singer, actress and television personality. She participated in Bigg Boss 7 in 2013. == Media career == In July 2012, Hayat was named the new "Curvy Icon" by Vogue Italia. In September 2013, Hayat named on the FHM sexiest women in the world list in position 81. She was a contestant on Bigg Boss 7 in 2013.
